metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8625 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
MediaWiki before 1.23.12, 1.24.x before 1.24.5, 1.25.x before 1.25.4, and 1.26.x before 1.26.1 do not properly sanitize parameters when calling the cURL library, which allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via an @ (at sign) character in unspecified POST array parameters.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8625` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.27.4-3
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.27.4-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.27.4-3').
